summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to a comprehensive improvement of portions of Delridge Way S.W., 17th Ave. S.W., and 20th Ave. S.W., authorizing an agreement with King County for financial assistance; providing for the preparation of plans, specifications and cost estimates and for construction fo the improvements; making appropriation from the Neighborhood Improvement Fund and the Arterial Development Fund; and increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1979 Budget of the Engineering Department to be reimbursed from the Light Fund and the financial assistance from King County.
